articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Amazon remembers it has an Android app store, kills it - Ars Technica
articles.description: Fire tablets and Fire TV devices will still have access to apps, though.

articles.author: Dino Grandoni
articles.title: We may be able to trap climate pollution in ordinary rocks - The Washington Post
articles.description: Scientists say they have figured out how to transform rocks into something extraordinary: a high-tech, low-cost substance that can bend geological time and help stall — or even reverse — planetary warming.
articles.content:
They look ordinary: gray with a hint of green, the sort of rock you may step over without thinking twice.
But a pair of scientists say they just figured out a way of transforming these plain slabs o… [+3905 chars]
